name: Featured Snippet
description: A box with a summary of an answer, extracted from a webpage.

name: People Also Ask
description: A box with questions related to the user's query.

name: Local Pack
description: A map and a list of local business locations.

name: Knowledge Panel
description: An information box that appears on the right side for entities.

name: Image Pack
description: A horizontal row of images that appear in search results.

name: Video Carousel
description: A carousel of video results, often from YouTube.

name: Top Stories
description: A block of recent news articles related to the query.

name: Site Links
description: Additional links that appear under the main URL for a result.

name: Reviews/Ratings
description: Star ratings that appear under a search result.
